wordGroup: pertinent data 有关资料，相应的资料

sentences.en: She had asked some pertinent questions.
sentences.cn: 她问了一些相关的问题。

sentences.en: Your remark is not pertinent to the subject.
Mrs. Southern listened keenly, occasionally breaking in with pertinent questions.
sentences.cn: 萨瑟恩夫人兴致勃勃地听着,偶尔插入一个相关的问题。
